section.name: About the foundation
section.p: Cyclops Group software foundation is started in the end of 2002 by Jiaqi Guo . If you want to share ideas, feel free to send email to cyclopsgroup@gmail.com or join our discussion group .

section.name: Powered By
section.p: There are a lot of items that can be called "Powered By". For example, my old Pentium MMX 200 desktop, my tiny shabby apartment and my favourite chinese restaurant. Of course I'm most powered by Xuying , my beautiful and smart wife.

Here's a partial list of technologies supporting Cyclops Group foundation. Each one of them is probably running in this very moment.
SourceForge.net
Source code is maintained in sourceforge.net. The source forge project cyclops-group contains all projects.
Apache Maven
The static website and document for all projects are generated by maven. Maven also manages and builds all the projects.
Anthill
Anthill pro is the continous building engine for Cyclops Group projects. The website, artifacts and documents are built by Anthill pro automatically.
Eclipse
Eclipse is my favourite JAVA IDE.
Atlassian
JIRA and Confluence are excellent tools for java developers.
Cenqua
Clover takes care of code coverage report and Cenqua also provides a free fisheye hosting.
Google
Analytics, GoogleGroup, AdSense services are used in Cyclops Group.
